doc:
Jimmy MacDonald (sound effects artist) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_MacDonald_(sound_effects_artist) 0 John James MacDonald (May 19, 1906 – February 1, 1991) was a Scottish-born American animator, voice actor, musician, and the original head of the Disney sound effects department. He was also the voice of Mickey Mouse from 1948 to 1977. John_James_MacDonald ( May_19_,_1906 – February_1_,_1991 ) was a_Scottish-born_American_animator , voice_actor , musician , and the_original_head of the_Disney_sound_effects_department . He was also the_voice of Mickey_Mouse from 1948 to 1977 .
